task.title: Enabling Coediting in a document
task.shortdesc: Coediting is essential for ideal use of the plugin.

context.p: Coediting enables the document contents of more than one editor to work together in real-time (also syncing the messages in real time). To enable it in your document, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Click the button in the top-right hand corner of your document's XD window
Under Invite to document Add people , enter the email addresses of your collaborators.

taskbody.result: In recent versions of XD, that's all you need to do to setup coediting. When clicking once again, you should now be able to see Coediting enabled at the bottom of the popup.
